page.title: 14Education-Elvington School.
page.content: { Elvington Church of England School. This school building was opened in 1969.There was another school in the village before this but it was too small.In this school at the moment there are 61 children who are aged between 5 and 11 years old.There are six age groups.Lower infants(5-6 years),Upper infants(6-7 years). Junior 1(7-8 years) Junior 2(8-9 years) Junior 3 (9-10 years) and Junior 4(10-11 years). The school has a large hall, which is used for many different purposes. It's main use is as a dining hall. The children can have school dinners which are prepared at Heslington school or they bring their own. The field is very big for a school of this size. It is big enough for football, cricket and rounders. (continued on page 18 )
